data.title: President’s Message
data.meta_description: Welcome to Oconee Fall Line Technical College! Whether you’re entering the classroom as a first-time student or coming back for a second career, we’re glad you decided to “think differently about college” and choose OFTC.  OFTC offers 100+ instructional programs leading to associate degrees, diplomas and technical certificates of credit which prepare students for careers in the […]
data.text:
Welcome to Oconee Fall Line Technical College! Whether you’re entering the classroom as a first-time student or coming back for a second career, we’re glad you decided to “think differently about college” and choose OFTC.

OFTC offers 100+ instructional programs leading to associate degrees, diplomas and technical certificates of credit which prepare students for careers in the industrial, business, computer, public service or allied health fields. Our programs prepare OFTC students to enter their first career, obtain the needed skills to change careers or advance in their current place of employment.

Local instructors with industry experience offer our students a unique opportunity to learn first-hand from those with proven expertise in their field. The hands-on experience incorporated into each program ensures the success of our graduates, demonstrated by OFTC’s workplace warranty.

Our commitment to a caring environment which promotes student success is a value we take very seriously at OFTC. Here, you’ll find others like you who are interested in excellent, affordable education; nationally accredited programs; and a talented faculty and staff. We offer a friendly, inclusive environment where you can be yourself and feel safe as you learn and grow.

We look forward to helping you achieve your dreams at OFTC.
